name: brightness_increasePartial
description: This function is used to slightly increase the brightness of a smart home appliance or place.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device or place which needs to be adjusted is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device or place which needs to be adjusted is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the brightness.
